channel.title: How to edit the server IP in Noobscape Client
channel.description:
Would yall know how to edit the Server IP in the Noobscape Client?
Pretty new at this, I got the Background and stuff. But pretty confused with changing the IP. I googled before posting this.
Here is the client to see if you can help me. http://www.mediafire.com/?jilnjbgk22m
I appreciate it.

item.title: How to edit the server IP in Noobscape Client
item.dc:creator: @unholyfaith unholyfaith
item.description:
@unholyfaith wrote:

kpop:

The link you gave was a closed client so you can’t change the ip.

Well do you know a client that will support my server without all the nulls it receives?

Read full topic
item.source: How to edit the server IP in Noobscape Client
